Package io.atlasmap.xml.core

Class XmlPath

java.lang.Object
io.atlasmap.core.AtlasPath
io.atlasmap.xml.core.XmlPath
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class XmlPath extends AtlasPath
The AtlasPath for the XML Document. TODO migrate to AtlasPath - https://github.com/atlasmap/atlasmap/issues/1767
